found a fix! it works for me hope will work for every1, after you have copy the crack/if you have avast right click on gameboost.exe then click /Run in sandbox/ and voila no crash, select maximum boost, don't 4get to select your settings type, after optimize now need a manual restart, hope it helped xD ^^  plz confirm if worked
